45	|	forty five
3456    | 	three thousand fifty six
100     | 	one hundred
234     |       two thousand thirty four
2034    |	two thousand thirty four
2000    |	two thousand
2030    |	two thousand thirty
102034    |	one hundred two thousand thirty four
100000    |	one hundred  thousand
100100    |	one hundred  thousand one hundred
100001    |	one hundred  thousand one
